column4: My x-server keeps randomly restarting.. usually when I click the tray icon of Kopete. How to resolve this? Running 8.04, http://pastebin.com/f7926b341 is my Xorg log. I'm using the latest restricted drivers.
you should be ok with 8.10, it has a new xorg
I'd prefer using a released version
just 4 days left but the RC is very stable, why fix a problem in an old release?
